Name: Get selected node
Description: Can I refer the currently selected node in the DOM tree from the console?

Chrome.Notes: 1. Use `$0` to access the currently selected node. Additionally, `$1`, `$2`, `$3`, ... will give you the last selected nodes in the reverse chronological order.

Firefox.Notes: 1. Use `$0` to access the currently selected node.

Edge.Notes: 1. Use `$0` to access the currently selected node. Additionally, `$1`, `$2`, `$3`, ... will give you the last selected nodes in the reverse chronological order.

Safari.Notes: 1. Use `$0` to access the currently selected node.

Opera.Notes: 1. Use `$0` to access the currently selected node. Additionally, `$1`, `$2`, `$3`, ... will give you the last selected nodes in the reverse chronological order.

Polypane.Notes: 1. Use `$0` to access the currently selected node. Additionally, `$1`, `$2`, `$3` and `$4` will give you the last selected nodes in the reverse chronological order.
